import React ,{useState , useEffect} from 'react' function SearchAnime(props){ const SEARCH_API = `https://kitsu.io/api/edge/anime?filter[text]=$` const style={ fontSize: "1.7rem", textAlign: "center" , width:"100%" , borderRadius:"25px", maxWidth:"100%", background:"#00000082", color:"white" } return
} export default SearchAnime
